name: LawTrades, Inc.
description: Operator of a talent recruitment platform intended to find, hire and work with professional lawyers. The company's platform allows attorneys to become independent, provides the tools to virtually eliminate admin and overhead expenditures and lets businesses hire vetted attorneys for reviewing contracts, filing patents, trademarking and immigration filings, enabling clients to find specific legal projects performed by vetted freelance attorneys at guaranteed fixed prices.
one_liner: Operator of a talent recruitment platform intended to find, hire and work with professional lawyers. The company's platform allows attorneys to become independent, provides the tools to virtually eliminate admin and overhead expenditures and lets businesses hire vetted attorneys for reviewing contracts, filing patents, trademarking and immigration filings, enabling clients to find specific legal projects performed by vetted freelance attorneys at guaranteed fixed prices.
